Services

Job-Seeking Services

Looking for work? Have you been job hunting for a while and don’t feel you’re any closer to a job offer than when you began your job search months ago? Then consider purchasing our services. Questions? Use the blue button on the right and shoot us an email. We’ll respond promptly.

Contact Us!

Consultation

This is a 90-minute consultation via phone or in-person to discuss your job search problems and their solutions. It is for individuals who are just getting started on their job search or career transition and want to spend some time exploring their options.

It includes market research, job search planning, and a résumé critique. If you choose to purchase any other job assistance service after the consultation, the consulting service fee will be credited for that service.

Resume Rewrite

This is a resume rewrite service for people who are experiencing a “No Calls” problem, which is usually a resume problem. In other words, they’ve been using their resume for 1-2 months, yet are not getting any calls from recruiters or not the right type of calls (i.e., job title, industry, etc.)

We rewrite your resume so it is online searchable, competitively layers and highly targeted. You will receive several versions of your resume. And we throw in a cover letter and a LinkedIn makeover to conclude the service.

Interview Prep

Employers are pre-screening candidates more now than they ever have! Quite often candidates can go through 3 to 5 interviews. This service addresses the need to sharpen your phone, skype and in-person interview technique.

Group Training

This is a 4-hour, group-training seminar for learning how to solve employment problems with the Get Hired Quickly Approach. Each seminar participant will have a one-on-one, private consultation after the seminar in addition to the group work conducted during the seminar.

Comprehensive Job Assistance

This is a turnkey-service for job seekers who need special assistance or are too busy to look for a job on their own. It covers job search planning, research, resume development & testing, job application submissions.

Get in Touch

Newsletter

Keep up on the best ways to find a job today featuring the tips, tools and tricks of the job-seeking trade. Enter your e-mail and subscribe to our newsletter.
